title: Offensive: Nmap Scanning (intermediate)
description: Master nmap scanning in the offensive track. This intermediate-level recipe provides hands-on experience with essential cybersecurity concepts and practical implementation techniques.

steps.instruction: Set up your offensive environment and verify all required tools are available
steps.evidence_hint: Screenshot of tool setup and verification

steps.instruction: Execute the primary nmap scanning procedure using appropriate tools and techniques
steps.evidence_hint: Command output or tool results screenshot

steps.instruction: Analyze the results and identify key findings, patterns, or security implications
steps.evidence_hint: Annotated analysis with key findings highlighted

steps.instruction: Document your methodology, findings, and create a summary report with recommendations
steps.evidence_hint: Final report document with all findings

steps.instruction: Clean up the environment and document lessons learned for future reference
steps.evidence_hint: Cleanup verification and lessons learned summary

validation_checks: Did you successfully complete all nmap scanning steps?
Can you explain the security implications of your findings?
Have you documented your methodology and results?
What evidence did you collect to support your analysis?
